DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of multiple doses of ALN-TTR02 in patients with transthyretin (TTR) mediated amyloidosis (ATTR).
DOC.brief_title: Trial to Evaluate Safety and Tolerability of ALN-TTR02 in Transthyretin (TTR) Amyloidosis
